question: [Brief] Portugues: Apresente which category has the highest bar do grafico de barras.

qas.question: [Brief] Portugues: Apresente which category has the highest bar do grafico de barras.
[Explain] Nederlands: Geef which category has the lowest bar vanuit het staafdiagram.
[Practice] Francais: Donnez what is the difference between the tallest and shortest bars depuis le diagramme en barres.
